summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Shocker Holdings for the period of December 1, 2014, to December 31, 2014. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the business during that period.

persons.name: Philip Hntchre
persons.context: Philip Hntchre is identified as the relationship manager for the account holder, providing support for business banking.

keyFacts: The account balance at the end of the statement period was $22,698.30.
The statement indicates a standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived.
The document outlines criteria for waiving service charges based on account balance and credit card spending.
The business maintains a total monthly average balance of $3,300 across its accounts.
The document promotes a prepaid MasterCard gift card program for employee recognition and customer appreciation.
